briefdescription.para: Initialize sensor. Initialize sensor, setting it active or inactive and initialize the lwm2m object accordingly. Intended to be only called by the sensors timer thread.

Read sensor values and process them. Read the values from the sensor, process them according the provided mode and transfer them to lwm2m objects, when notify indicates that. Intended to be only called by the sensors timer thread.
This file provides the implementation of LWM2MSensorDeviceAccelerometer module.
